topic.title: Womens Health Patient Refusal - conformance rules

section.p: This class captures information about the procedures a patient has refused.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date the patient refused the procedure, test or examination.

Contains exactly one [1..1] reason with data type Code
Indicates a general reason for why the patient refused treatment.
Contains exactly one [1..1] remarks with data type String

Contains exactly one [1..1] refusedActivity with data type Code
Identifies the procedure or type of health care the patient refused.

Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
The date the patient refused the procedure, test or examination.

Contains exactly one [1..1] reason with data type Code
Indicates a general reason for why the patient refused treatment.
Contains exactly one [1..1] remarks with data type String

Contains exactly one [1..1] refusedActivity with data type Code
Identifies the procedure or type of health care the patient refused.
